p: The near-UV chip and package glue were commercial products obtained from Ningbo Sunpu Led Co., Ltd. and Beijing KMT Technology Co., Ltd., respectively. Briefly, certain amounts of A glue (0.1 g), B glue (0.4 g), and GdBO 3:Eu 3+ phosphors (0.2 g) were mixed homogeneously. The mixture was then dropped on the near-UV chips to cover the surface of the chips completely. Afterward, the LED devices were heated at 150 Â°C for 4 h and then cooled to the room temperature for testing.
